PHRASE.LANG: Leather gloves perfect for keeping the ice off your hands, and for keeping warm blood in your hands. If they get numb, start rubbing your chest vigorously. [#Legal]
Ces gants en cuir n'ont pas leur pareil pour prévenir les engelures et réchauffer vos doigts frigorifiés. Si vous ne les sentez plus, frottez-les vigoureusement contre votre torse.[#Legal]
Lederhandschuhe zum Schutz gegen Eiseskälte. Sollten Ihnen die Hände dennoch kalt werden, reiben Sie sie kräftig gegen die Brust.[#Legal]
Guanti di pelle ideali per tener calde le mani e mantenere ottimale la circolazione. Se le mani dovessero intirizzirsi, sfregale vigorosamente contro il petto.[#Legal]
Guantes de cuero, perfectos para protegerte del hielo y mantener las manos calientes. Si se te duermen, frótalas con fuerza contra el pecho.[#Legal]
눈과 얼음에서 손을 보호할 수 있는 가죽 장갑. 손이 얼얼해진다면 가슴에 대고 열심히 비비자.[#Legal]
Leather gloves perfect for keeping the ice off your hands, and for keeping warm blood in your hands. If they get numb, start rubbing your chest vigorously.[#Legal]
羽毛外套能從冰雪中完美保護你的雙手，並幫助溫血暢通。假若感覺麻木，要趕快用力在胸前摩擦。[#Legal]
羽毛外套能從冰雪中完美保護你的雙手，並幫助溫血暢通。假若感覺麻木，要趕快用力在胸前摩擦。[#Legal]
Leather gloves perfect for keeping the ice off your hands, and for keeping warm blood in your hands. If they get numb, start rubbing your chest vigorously.[#Legal]
